ffmpegPrefsIni:
[Version]
Version=4

[WebM HD 3600 kbit]
Cmd=-analyzeduration 1500k -threads {threads} {offset} {realtime} -i "{infile}" -threads {threads} -f webm -vcodec libvpx -quality {quality} -bufsize 6400k -b:v 3200k -crf  10 -cpu-used {cpu-used} {framerate} -map 0:0 -map 0:1 -vf "yadif=0:-1:1, scale={scalex}:{scaley}" -acodec libvorbis -ab 128k -ar 44100 -ac 2 -async 1 -y "{outfile}"
maxWidth=1280
maxHeight=720
MimeType=video/webm
Ext=.webm
Delay=2000

[WebM High 1800 kbit]
Cmd=-analyzeduration 1500k -threads {threads} {offset} {realtime} -i "{infile}" -threads {threads} -f webm -vcodec libvpx -quality {quality} -bufsize 3200k -b:v 1600k -crf  15 -cpu-used {cpu-used} {framerate} -map 0:0 -map 0:1 -vf "yadif=0:-1:1, scale={scalex}:{scaley}" -acodec libvorbis -ab 96k -ar 44100 -ac 2 -async 1 -y "{outfile}"
maxWidth=720
maxHeight=576
MimeType=video/webm
Ext=.webm
Delay=2000

[WebM Mid 1200 kbit]
Cmd=-analyzeduration 1500k -threads {threads} {offset} {realtime} -i "{infile}" -threads {threads} -f webm -vcodec libvpx -quality {quality} -bufsize 2000k -b:v 1000k -crf  15 -cpu-used {cpu-used} {framerate} -map 0:0 -map 0:1 -vf "yadif=0:-1:1, scale={scalex}:{scaley}" -acodec libvorbis -ab 64k -ar 44100 -ac 2 -async 1 -y "{outfile}"
maxWidth=640
maxHeight=360
MimeType=video/webm
Ext=.webm
Delay=2000

[WebM Low 800 kbit]
Cmd=-analyzeduration 1500k -threads {threads} {offset} {realtime} -i "{infile}" -threads {threads} -f webm -vcodec libvpx -quality {quality} -bufsize 1400k -b:v 700k -crf  20 -cpu-used {cpu-used} {framerate} -map 0:0 -map 0:1 -vf "yadif=0:-1:1, scale={scalex}:{scaley}" -acodec libvorbis -ab 48k -ar 44100 -ac 1 -async 1 -y "{outfile}"
maxWidth=512
maxHeight=288
MimeType=video/webm
Ext=.webm
Delay=2000

[WebM Lowest 400 kbit]
Cmd=-analyzeduration 1500k -threads {threads} {offset} {realtime} -i "{infile}" -threads {threads} -f webm -vcodec libvpx -quality {quality} -bufsize 600k -b:v 300k -crf  30 -cpu-used {cpu-used} {framerate} -map 0:0 -map 0:1 -vf "yadif=0:-1:1, scale={scalex}:{scaley}" -acodec libvorbis -ab 32k -ar 32000 -ac 1 -async 1 -y "{outfile}"
maxWidth=480
maxHeight=270
MimeType=video/webm
Ext=.webm
Delay=2000

[WebM Audio 128 kbit]
Cmd=-analyzeduration 1M -threads {threads} {offset} {realtime} -i "{infile}" -f webm -vn -acodec libvorbis -ab 128k -ar 44100 -ac 2 -y -threads {threads} "{outfile}"
MimeType=audio/webm
ext=.webm

[Flash HD 3600 kbit]
Cmd=-analyzeduration 1500k -threads {threads} {offset} {realtime} -i "{infile}" -threads {threads} -f flv -vcodec libx264 -bufsize 6400k -maxrate 3200k -crf 20 -g 50 {framerate} -map 0:0 -map 0:1 -vf "yadif=0:-1:1, scale={scalex}:{scaley}" -preset {vpreset} -tune film -vprofile main -level 30 -acodec libmp3lame -ab 128k -ar 44100 -ac 2 -async 1 -y "{outfile}"
